com.dadatoolkit.android.os

类 HandlerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.dadatoolkit.android.os.HandlerThread
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class HandlerThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Thread with Looper(NOT MAIN THREAD LOOPER)

    • 方法详细资料

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Message msg)
        Call setOnHandleListener then you could use this
        to sendMessage to this handler.
        And handle it in handleMessage(Message msg)
        参数:
        msg -
